SET NOCOUNT ON /* 매장별 근무시간 가져오기 GetStoreBusinessHourList */ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @STORE_CODE INT = {0} SELECT A.STORE_CODE , A.SCHEDULE_TYPE , AC.NAME AS SCHEDULE_TYPE_NAME , A.SCHEDULE_TYPE_DTL , ISNULL(B.NAME,'') AS WEEK_NAME , A.FR_TIME , dbo.[fn_GetTimeMeridiem](A.FR_TIME) AS FR_TIME2 , A.TO_TIME , dbo.[fn_GetTimeMeridiem](A.TO_TIME) AS TO_TIME2 , A.REMARK , A.STATUS , C.NAME AS STATUS_NAME , A.INSERT_CODE , A.INSERT_DATE , A.UPDATE_CODE , A.UPDATE_DATE FROM T_STORE_BUSINESSHOURS A INNER JOIN T_COMMON AC ON AC.MAIN_CODE = 'S002' AND AC.SUB_CODE = A.SCHEDULE_TYPE LEFT JOIN T_COMMON B ON B.MAIN_CODE = 'D001' AND B.SUB_CODE = A.SCHEDULE_TYPE_DTL INNER JOIN T_COMMON C ON C.MAIN_CODE = 'S003' AND C.SUB_CODE = A.STATUS WHERE 1=1 #[SEARCH_DATE] ORDER BY A.STORE_CODE , A.SCHEDULE_TYPE , A.SCHEDULE_TYPE_DTL , A.FR_TIME SET NOCOUNT OFF
